self_predictions.prediction_summary: John is as prepared as he can be but is unsure of Alexei's condition. He hopes to neutralize Alexei's wrist control and use his own strengths.

Alexei Voevoda.strength: Incredible hand and wrist, explosive, possibly stronger and faster than John
Alexei Voevoda.health: Appears to be in great condition, agile despite being over 40
Alexei Voevoda.previous_match_summary: Alexei's last comeback was not embarrassing but he didn't like losing. Expected to be better prepared this time.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: If Frank can maintain hand and wrist position, he is likely the stronger arm. Age might be a factor.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Hand and wrist control vs side pressure

Frank Lamparelli.previous_match_summary: Has beaten Matt Mask before with dead wrist and side pressure.

Matt Mask.health: Not a spring chicken but younger than Frank
Matt Mask.previous_match_summary: Usually loses to Frank but can be competitive.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Lachlan needs to be explosive and dominate early. If the match goes longer, Krasimir's endurance and defensive hook could prevail.
third_party_predictions.predicted_duration: Short match favors Lachlan, longer match favors Krasimir

Lachlan Adair.previous_match_summary: Has been improving and getting bigger.

Krasimir Kostadinov.previous_match_summary: Known for his stopping power and endurance.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin believes the match is historically significant and hopes for a good match. He doesn't care who wins but appreciates the legends meeting.

John Brzenk.strength: Strong hand, short forearm for leverage
John Brzenk.health: Dealing with some injuries but prepared
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: Still competitive at his weight class.

Alexei Voevoda.strength: Gifted athlete, explosive, strong hand and wrist
Alexei Voevoda.health: Appears to be in great condition
Alexei Voevoda.previous_match_summary: Made a big impact in a short time.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin gives a slight edge to Matt Mask but wouldn't be surprised if Frank wins. It's a close match.

Matt Mask.previous_match_summary: Usually loses to Frank but can be competitive.
